snippet: The women’s edition of the annual boat race between the English universities Oxford and Cambridge will be staged on the same day and the same course as the men’s event starting in 2015.
lead_paragraph: The women’s edition of the annual boat race between the English universities Oxford and Cambridge will be staged on the same day and the same course as the men’s event starting in 2015.

headline.seo: Women Get Equal Billing on Thames
headline.main: Women Get Equal Billing on Thames
headline.print_headline: Women Get Equal Billing on Thames
